name: ite/js-bundle
description: Creates global JavaScript object and provide tools for making the bridge between Symfony 2 and JavaScript.

suggest.ite/js-ajax-block: Provides functional for rendering Twig blocks via AJAX.
suggest.ite/js-notification: Provide support of display notifications via Javascript
suggest.ite/js-notification-toastr: ITEJSBundle extension to show notifications via toastr.js
